metadata.title: CVE-2024-2182 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Open Virtual Network (OVN). In OVN clusters whereBFD is used between hypervisors for high availability, an attacker caninject specially crafted BFD packets from inside unprivileged workloads,including virtual machines or containers, that can trigger a denial ofservice.

criterions.comment: ovn package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '24.03.1-1').
